choose-file.label: Click to choose a file
choose-file.helper: or drag and drop a file to this page

drag-tip: Release mouse to read the file

cache-size.label: Single Cache Size
cache-size.description: The size of each cached file when sharding cache files. Larger values improve read speed but consume more memory

tips.less-0: Cache size must be greater than 0

system-notification.label: System Notification
system-notification.description: Send system notification when computation is complete
system-notification.button: Click to send a test notification
system-notification.permission-info: Super Hash needs notification permissions to alert you when calculations are complete. You can choose to deny this permission, and the app will continue to function normally.

algorithm-suggest.label: Algorithm Suggestion
algorithm-suggest.description: Automatically match algorithms based on input checksum values

auto-copy.label: Auto Copy
auto-copy.description: Automatically copy the checksum to the clipboard after calculation (only works in generation mode)

auto-update.label: Auto Update
auto-update.description: Automatically check for updates when the app starts

theme-color.label: Theme Color
theme-color.description: Configure your preferred theme color for the app

dialog.headline: Pick theme color
dialog.description: Choose a theme color you like for the app

language.label: Language
language.description: Select the display language for the app

dialog.description: Select your preferred language for the app interface
dialog.headline: Choose Language

clear-cache.label: Clear Cache
clear-cache.description: Clear the app's cached data (personal settings will not be deleted)

dialog.description: The app is about to clear its cache. This will not delete any of your personal settings. The app will reload immediately after the process is complete. Continue?

reset.label: Reset
reset.description: Clear all data including personal settings

dialog.description: The app is about to reset. After resetting, all cache and personal settings will be cleared, and the app will be restored to its initial state. Additionally, the app will reload immediately to apply the changes. Confirm to continue?

pwa.offline-ready: Super Hash is ready for offline use

notification.not-supported: Browser notifications arenot supported or denied the permission

checksum-input.helper: Paste or enter the checksum here
checksum-input.label: Checksum
